ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds Brussels sprouts, ends trimmed and yellow leaves removed
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Remove yellowed outer leaves and trim ends for better roasting
Toss Brussels sprouts halfway through cooking for even browning
Don't crowd the baking sheet to allow proper caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you ensure maximum caramelization on roasted Brussels sprouts?
